title: In the Outlander book series, is Fergus possibly related to Claire? - Quora

response.answer_text: No he was working in a whorehouse in Paris when Jamie Matthew and his mother had died she was a prostitute in the later books his father tries to get a hold of him but he was not related to clear in anyway
No. Fergus is not related to Claire. Fergus was born in eighteenth century Paris. Claire was born in twentieth-century Great Britain.
